### writing my first function


```{r}
x_vec = rnorm(n = 25, mean = 10, sd = 3.5)

(x_vec - mean(x_vec)) / sd(x_vec)
```

```{r}
z_score = function(x) {
  
  if (!is.numeric()){
    
    stop("x needs to be numeric")
  }
  
  if(length(x)<5){
    stop(you need at least five numbers to compute z score)
  } 
  
  z = (x - mean(x)) / sd(x)
  
  return(z)
  
}

z_score(x = x_vec)
```
```{r}
z_score(x = 3)
z_score(x = c("my" "name"))

```
